name: Character Maker QR
first_mes:
Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) Sort it after UID â†— Lorebook that controls generation for each generation [Character Maker Combined NSFW GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) Sort it after Name A-Z ---

Quick Reply Sets

[Visible QR Buttons](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) The only set you need to add to the Global Quick Reply Sets (Needed) It contains 3 buttons. - New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type (Makes a new chat and lets you select Gender, Type and transformation of the character. **Start with this**) - Character Generator Swipe (Lets you swipe the last message making a new one without loosing the old one) - Generate Character Choice (Lets you select what you want to generate next) [Character Maker Generation](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) All the logic for the Generate Character Choice button. (Needed) 01. Generate Basic Information (Needs to be first) 02. Generate Appearance information (Can be used multiple times) 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information (Family, Friends, Enemies and Rivals) 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks (Will be hidden from the rest of the generation) 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can be used multiple times) 09. Generate Background Information 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information (Setting and Daily Routine) 12. Additional Notes (Strengths, Weaknesses, Likes, Dislikes, Sexual Knowledge and Sexual Experience) 13. Spells and Abilities 14. Copy Character Rules (Copies the rules the character will follow to the chat from the Lorebook) 15. Generate Extras (Personality Summary and Speech Examples) 16. Generate Scenario (Makes a scenario that can be used as a first message) (Can make multiple) ---

Required External Downloads

[LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets (Needed) (Update needed for V6.0) ---

Optional Downloads

[TabbyAPI Models](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/TabbyAPI%20Loader%20Setting.json) Models and settings i have tried. [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) Addon for SillyTavern to see variables that are in use. (Recommended for debugging) To debug empty the Flushvar QR button from the "Character Maker V4" set. This let you see all variables that are used and if something is wrong you can probably find it here. a broken var usually looks likt this '{{something}}'. (This "button" empties all local variables that this cards buttons makes)
creatorcomment:
Using a empty persona is recommended. If you have any tips on refinements of the Lorebook/QR buttons make a comment (On [chub.ai](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-sillytavern-quick-reply-driven-0eb2c2852a4f) or on the [github](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker)) and i will look it over. Especially the `/genraw`

________________________________

Last Update

V6.0.0 - Beta These are the ones that have been updated to the new LALib version: ' New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type Character Generator Swipe Generate Character Choice Debug On/Off ' Generate Character Choice that are updated are: ' 01. Generate Basic Information (form) 02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple) 14. Copy Character Rules 16. Generate Scenario ' And all required QR buttons for the above. The rest should still work but will give warnings. Updated for new [LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) version make sure to update. Added check to make sure LALib is installed and enabled. Added Skin Color for species without covering. Added printout for Realistic characters (Characters from shows/anime's/books etc..) only showing when selecting it on new character. Added spoken language (single or multiple) Added nationality and ethnicity to the generation. (option to ignore it) Added exclusion and guidance to most if not all dialogue options to help get the result you want. Added generation for user's Relation to the generated character. Moved the order of generation. Added guidance for 'Additional Notes' (Letting you prevent specific things from generating or pushing the generation towards specific things) Moved general exclusion from "Get Char Info" to Lorebook. Fixed minor typos and stuff Redownload [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) V5.2.0 Added a Debug Button to the QR that prevents the variables from being wiped. I recommend using [Variable Viewer addon](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) to see the variables. GenRaw content moved from the QR Buttons to [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) to make it easier to change and update. QR Buttons updated to reflect this. Fixed some spelling mistakes and errors with the QE Buttons Plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) The character card is updated but there is no need to redownload it. V5.1.0 Removed alt greeting (Not used) Updated setup instructions (SillyTavern main branch is updated to 1.12 and there is no need to change branch of LALib) Update SillyTavern if you get an error. Updated the lorebooks 'Character Rules' and the button copying it to make the examples and scenario less confused. Rewrote 'Additional Notes' to hopefully give better results. plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) The character card is updated but there is no need to redownload it. V5.0.9 Changed the card name on chub.ai plz redownload the character card or rename yours to Character Maker QR V5.0.8 Fixed some typos that prevented some data from being correctly loaded. Fixed some of the generation options to replacing the last message instead of hiding it. plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json)

________________________________

All extra information like age/kinks/fears/species will guide the direction of the character. You can then edit the output to your liking or make it regen all of it. Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork)

________________________________

Known Problems When using 'release' branch the FlushVar button will not work. (This should not have any negative effects.) If you want to manually remove the variables you can use [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) or manually remove them by first using the '/listvar' command to get all variables in use followed by '/flushvar x' where x is the variable name. Some subcategories need refining

________________________________

Version history V5.2.0 Added a Debug Button to the QR that prevents the variables from being wiped. I recommend using [Variable Viewer addon](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) to see the variables. GenRaw content moved from the QR Buttons to [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) to make it easier to change and update. QR Buttons updated to reflect this. Fixed some spelling mistakes and errors with the QE Buttons Plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) The character card is updated but there is no need to redownload it. V5.1.0 Removed alt greeting (Not used) Updated setup instructions (SillyTavern main branch is updated to 1.12 and there is no need to change branch of LALib) Update SillyTavern if you get an error. Updated the lorebooks 'Character Rules' and the button copying it to make the examples and scenario less confused. Rewrote 'Additional Notes' to hopefully give better results. plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) The character card is updated but there is no need to redownload it. V5.0.9 Changed the card name on chub.ai plz redownload the character card or rename yours to Character Maker QR V5.0.8 Fixed some typos that prevented some data from being correctly loaded. Fixed some of the generation options to replacing the last message instead of hiding it. plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) V5.0.7 plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V5.0.6 Added Posture to manual species and fixed Sub species exclusion plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V5.0.5 Fixed logic mistake and fixed Manually adding Genre variable. plz redownload [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V5.0.4 Fixed tagging for Reptilians in [Character Maker](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) plz update if you are trying to make a Reptilian Character. You can manually fix it by changing "Data Bank -> tags" to *, FREPTILIAN or *, MREPTILIAN where * is the tag infront ex FBNFREPTILIAN to FBN, FREPTILIAN V5.0.3 Fixed missing :}| cousing an error with [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) plz update V5.0.2 Fixed gender variable for [Character Maker](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) plz update V5.0.1 Had wrong link for Character Maker Generation QR button in the first message V5 Updated to Image of the card. Remade the card to lean more on the QR Buttons Made a button to select what you want to do instead of multiple buttons cluttering the UI So now you only have 3 buttons "New Character" (Selects what type of character you make), "Swipe" (A button to make a Swipe of the last message using the logic for the other buttons) and "Generate" (Lets you select what you want to generate.) Sadly this breaks the normal "Swipe" and "Continue" buttons for most generations (on this card) V4.3 Re added LALib requirement for QR buttons Added a popup for '2. Generate Appearance Info' asking for What type of For the appearance should generate for (Human Form, Alternate Form) Mostly for Werewolf's and other shapeshifters. (Only for Demi-Humans for now) Updated Lorebook to reflect this. Added a new QR button that is using LALib (This is the one that is going to be updated going forward) The old QR button is updated to work with this update but will not be updated any more. Updated Character Card's Alt. Greeting with new links. I will probably remove outfit from '2. Generate Appearance Info' making it separate enabling you to generate Different outfits for different occasions. V4.2 Made a new QR button that lets you select the Gender and Type of character you want to make. Changed from snippet.host to github.com for links. Updated the character card and Lorebook to reflect link changes and added QR button (See Alt. Greetings for updated links and link to new QR Button). The '2. Generate Appearance Info' QR button now asks for what type of outfit (One-Piece or Two-Piece) the character should have (Only Females). Lorebook Updated to reflect this. V4.1.3 Updated Quick Replies for more dynamic hiding of generate messages especially Latent kinks and Scenario. V4.1.2 Updated Lorebook to have allow different types of outfits (For now, One-Piece and Two-Piece outfit, and only for females) Updated Quick Replies to allow the user to select the type of outfit (Working on a check to see if the character is a male or female) V4.1.1 Small changes to the Lorebook V4.1 Updated the Quick Replies to not needing LALib and they can now be Generated in any order (Still recommended to Generate in the numbered order) 'Basic Information' still needs to be first 'Scenario' still needs to be last (You can make multiple) V4.0 Extensive changes done to the Lorebook and card Read Alt greeting 2 for downloads Added Demi-Humans, Beastkin, PokÃ©mon (WIP but usable with a PokÃ©mon Lorebook), Machines (Heavy WIP almost no testing done) V3.0 Rewritten to use a Lorebook based style for easier overview and ease of use. V2.1 Added Example dialogs V2.0 Split from [Character Maker](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-b47ccbf9b852) to make it easier to make more gender/species specific Example dialogs V1.3.0 Changed Initial message 2 to only make humans Added Initial message 3 to make non-humans Changed Unknown Fetish to Latent Fetish V1.2.1 Added recommendation for lorebook to use with character (nothing else changed) V1.2 Added Knowledge and Experience, changed Scenario V1.1 Changed Tagline V1.0 Initial upload

data.name: Character Maker QR
data.first_mes:
Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) Sort it after UID â†— Lorebook that controls generation for each generation [Character Maker Combined NSFW GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) Sort it after Name A-Z ---

Added a new QR button that is using LALib (This is the one that is going to be updated going forward) The old QR button is updated to work with this update but will not be updated any more. Updated Character Card's Alt. Greeting with new links. I will probably remove outfit from '2. Generate Appearance Info' making it separate enabling you to generate Different outfits for different occasions. V4.2 Made a new QR button that lets you select the Gender and Type of character you want to make. Changed from snippet.host to github.com for links. Updated the character card and Lorebook to reflect link changes and added QR button (See Alt. Greetings for updated links and link to new QR Button). The '2. Generate Appearance Info' QR button now asks for what type of outfit (One-Piece or Two-Piece) the character should have (Only Females). Lorebook Updated to reflect this. V4.1.2 Updated Lorebook to have allow different types of outfits (For now, One-Piece and Two-Piece outfit, and only for females) Updated Quick Replies to allow the user to select the type of outfit (Working on a check to see if the character is a male or female) V4.1.1 Small changes to the Lorebook V4.1 Updated the Quick Replies to not needing LALib and they can now be Generated in any order (Still recommended to Generate in the numbered order) 'Basic Information' still needs to be first 'Scenario' still needs to be last (You can make multiple) V4.0 Extensive changes done to the Lorebook and card Read Alt greeting 2 for downloads Added Demi-Humans, Beastkin, PokÃ©mon (WIP but usable with a PokÃ©mon Lorebook), Machines (Heavy WIP almost no testing done) V3.0 Rewritten to use a Lorebook based style for easier overview and ease of use.
